price: 62. (Entonces) le preguntaron: “¿Has sido tú quien ha hecho esto con nuestros ídolos, Abraham?”.
arabic: قَالُوٓاْ ءَأَنتَ فَعَلۡتَ هَٰذَا بِـَٔالِهَتِنَا يَٰٓإِبۡرَٰهِيمُ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: qālū a-anta faʿalta hādhā biālihatinā yāib'rāhīmu
